description:
Langa, a transfer student from Canada, meets Reki, a high school student who loves skateboarding. Reki seems to be hooked on "S," a dangerous and secret race that is held in an abandoned mine. Langa, who was looking for a part-time job, heads to the "S" venue together with Reki as an assistant. There, the nemesis Shadow who caused Reki`s injury taunts Reki, and Langa, who has no experience skating, gets roped in, as well!
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Atsui Yoru ni Yuki ga Furu
